annotation.text: annexin 2 becomes phosphorylated and colocalizes with activated v-Src and focal adhesion kinase both at the plasma membrane and in a Rab11-positive compartment of the endosomal pathway.
In cells depleted of annexin 2 by small interfering RNA, v-Src becomes activated at the permissive temperature but does not target to the plasma membrane or to perinuclear vesicles,
Cell Lines and Antibodies:Rat-1 fibroblasts containing the L29A temperature-sensitive, constitutively active mutant of v-Src
annexin 2 became enriched at the cell cortex,
By 48 h, many of the cells showed marked enrichment of Src-pY416 and annexin 2 in the cortex, in ruffles, on large macropinosomes,
By 48 h, many of the cells showed marked enrichment of Src-pY416 and annexin 2 in the cortex, in ruffles, on large macropinosomes,
By 48 h, many of the cells showed marked enrichment of Src-pY416 and annexin 2 in the cortex, in ruffles, on large macropinosomes,
Over a 48-h time course following a switch to the permissive temperature (35 C), annexin 2 became enriched at the cell cortex,
The inset on the 48-h merged image shows the colocalization of annexin 2 and Src-pY416 at the plasma membrane (arrowheads).

cells lacking annexin 2 failed to exhibit the relocalization of active Src, FAK-pY576, paxillin-pY118, and actin to the perinuclear endosomal compartment, membrane ruffles, membrane ruffles, or macropinosomes,
Levels of FAK-pY576 were almost undetectable by Western blot analysis following siRNA treatment for annexin 2
Annexin 2 is present throughout the cytoplasm,
After 4 h at 35 C, annexin 2, actin, and Src-pY416 appear at the actin-rich cortex and in a perinuclear vesicular domain
After 4 h at 35 C, annexin 2, actin, and Src-pY416 appear at the actin-rich cortex and in a perinuclear vesicular domain

B, whole cell extracts were prepared from R1LA29 cells following a 4-day culture at 41 C in the presence of control or annexin 2 siRNA and from cells that had been switched to the permissive temperature for the times indicated and immunoblotted as described in the legend to Fig. The right panel shows extracts from the control siRNA-treated cells at the restrictive temperature and after 36 h at the permissive temperature. There is an increase in phosphorylation of Src on phospho-Tyr416 and of paxillin on phospho-Tyr118, but phosphorylation on FAK at phospho-Tyr576 is impaired.

we observed relocalization of annexin 2, Src-pY416, FAK-pY576, FAK-pY925, paxillin-pY118, PAK1 (data not shown), and F-actin not only to dynamic actin-rich ruffles at the cell cortex but also to cytoplasmic and perinuclear vesicles

we observed relocalization of annexin 2, Src-pY416, FAK-pY576, FAK-pY925, paxillin-pY118, PAK1 (data not shown), and F-actin not only to dynamic actin-rich ruffles at the cell cortex but also to cytoplasmic and perinuclear vesicles

we observed relocalization of annexin 2, Src-pY416, FAK-pY576, FAK-pY925, paxillin-pY118, PAK1 (data not shown), and F-actin not only to dynamic actin-rich ruffles at the cell cortex but also to cytoplasmic and perinuclear vesicles
The Rab11-GFP-positive perinuclear compartment also stained for annexin 2
hite arrowhead), the localization of Rab11-GFP resembled that observed in normal cells at the nonpermissive temperature
In contrast, annexin 2-positive cells acquired a transformed phenotype in which annexin 2 relocalized to the cell cortex.
there was ~50% less FAK-pY576 staining at the focal adhesions of annexin 2-depleted cells compared with the invadopodia of the morphologically transformed annexin 2-positive cells (Fig. 5B).
2B and 3 and reinforces the idea that annexin 2 is required for the tyrosine phosphorylation of FAK on tyrosine 576 by activated v-Src,
only 25% of control cells failed to divide, whereas nearly 60% of cells in the annexin 2-depleted culture remained as single undivided cells (Fig. 6).
In cells switched to the permissive temperature and partially depleted of annexin 2,
The merged image shows intense colocalization of annexin 2 at the perinuclear endosomal compartment

annexin 2 colocalizes with FAK-pY925 and paxillin-pY118 at the cell cortex, on ruffling membranes (yellow arrowheads), on vesicles in the cytoplasm (white arrowheads), and in the perinuclear recycling compartment

annexin 2 colocalizes with FAK-pY925 and paxillin-pY118 at the cell cortex, on ruffling membranes (yellow arrowheads), on vesicles in the cytoplasm (white arrowheads), and in the perinuclear recycling compartment

annexin 2 colocalizes with FAK-pY925 and paxillin-pY118 at the cell cortex, on ruffling membranes (yellow arrowheads), on vesicles in the cytoplasm (white arrowheads), and in the perinuclear recycling compartment
there was more FAK-pY576 present in the invadopodia of transformed cells than in the focal adhesions of annexin 2-depleted (anx 2) untransformed cells.
